49 2203 303362:# 5
BIO
Angelo P. John Is the founder and director of the A.P. John Institute for Cancer Research. In 1978, the institute was Incorporated as a non-profit corporation In the State of Connecticut. In: 1982, It was awarded a tax-exempt status.
Mr. John has been studying and researching cancer for more than 35 years. He worked as a dietition for five years while attending evening college classes in anatomy, physiology, biology and blochemistry.
In 1961. his book, DIAITIS, ANTI-CANCER NUTRIENTS IN ITS PREVENTION & CURE. was published by Bridgehead Books of New York. In this book, Mr. John outlined his concepts on the prevention, causation and treatment of cancer .. all of which contradicted the prevailing concepts on. cancer.
In the past several years, all' of his concepts have elther been validated or are very near being confirmed. For example:
a) Diet and nutrition can help prevent cancer. (In 1961. anyone who suggested that diet and nutrition had anything to do with cancer was considered a "food quack.")
b) The 50-odd nutrients derived from a proper diet are used to comprise within the body a DETOXIFICATION SYSTEM, and this DETOX SYSTEM (along with Individual nutrients such as Vitamin A, C and E, plus carotene and selenium), act as the first line of defense against cancer.
c) Most cancers In man are caused by chemicals (such as the oxygen radicals): which are generated within the body. When the radicals are not properly DETOXIFIED, mostly because of poor dietary habhs. pre-cancerous cells develop which most often develop Into cancer ..
d) Most cancers do not develop because of genetic abnormalities (such as mutations, transposed genes, oncogenes or suppressor genes), but instead in a. defect In cell structures called the CENTRIOLES, which control the process of cell replication.
e) Cancer can be successfully treated with a technique called: INTRA-TUMOR THERAPY - which entails Injecting a chemical such as hydrogen peroxide directly into the tumor .. At the same time, a patient would be placed on diet and nutritional therapy.
In 1990 Mr. John also developed a new technique for treating cancer (which he had patented), called ISCHEMIA-REPERFUSION TUMOR THERAPY. Initial trials In Sweden have proven highly successfuli
Mr. John believes that when hospitals make INTRA-TUMOR THERAPY. ISCHEMIA-REPERFUSION THERAPY and DIET AND NUTRITIONAL THERAPY avallable to all cancer patients, along with chemotherapy and radiation therapy, cancer will become a highly treatable disease.

paragraphs.content: Angelo P. John Is the founder and director of the A.P. John Institute for Cancer Research. In 1978, the institute was Incorporated as a non-profit corporation In the State of Connecticut. In: 1982, It was awarded a tax-exempt status.

Mr. John has been studying and researching cancer for more than 35 years. He worked as a dietition for five years while attending evening college classes in anatomy, physiology, biology and blochemistry.

In 1961. his book, DIAITIS, ANTI-CANCER NUTRIENTS IN ITS PREVENTION & CURE. was published by Bridgehead Books of New York. In this book, Mr. John outlined his concepts on the prevention, causation and treatment of cancer .. all of which contradicted the prevailing concepts on. cancer.
In the past several years, all' of his concepts have elther been validated or are very near being confirmed. For example:
a) Diet and nutrition can help prevent cancer. (In 1961. anyone who suggested that diet and nutrition had anything to do with cancer was considered a "food quack.")

b) The 50-odd nutrients derived from a proper diet are used to comprise within the body a DETOXIFICATION SYSTEM, and this DETOX SYSTEM (along with Individual nutrients such as Vitamin A, C and E, plus carotene and selenium), act as the first line of defense against cancer.

c) Most cancers In man are caused by chemicals (such as the oxygen radicals): which are generated within the body. When the radicals are not properly DETOXIFIED, mostly because of poor dietary habhs. pre-cancerous cells develop which most often develop Into cancer ..

d) Most cancers do not develop because of genetic abnormalities (such as mutations, transposed genes, oncogenes or suppressor genes), but instead in a. defect In cell structures called the CENTRIOLES, which control the process of cell replication.

e) Cancer can be successfully treated with a technique called: INTRA-TUMOR THERAPY - which entails Injecting a chemical such as hydrogen peroxide directly into the tumor .. At the same time, a patient would be placed on diet and nutritional therapy.
In 1990 Mr. John also developed a new technique for treating cancer (which he had patented), called ISCHEMIA-REPERFUSION TUMOR THERAPY. Initial trials In Sweden have proven highly successfuli

Mr. John believes that when hospitals make INTRA-TUMOR THERAPY. ISCHEMIA-REPERFUSION THERAPY and DIET AND NUTRITIONAL THERAPY avallable to all cancer patients, along with chemotherapy and radiation therapy, cancer will become a highly treatable disease.
